person.persName: Susan Marshall Marcus (Grant County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to John W Marcus in Owen County, Kentucky on January 26, 1826. Mother of Mason Marcus, John M Marcus, James D Marcus, Emma Marcus, Martha J Marcus, Mary A Marcus. Resident in Grant County in 1860.
